HomePage.title: Image Color Replacement Tool
HomePage.description: Browser-based tool for fast image color replacement. Swap multiple colors, batch edit files, and keep quality with private on-device processing.
HomePage.keywords: image color replacement, color swap tool, batch image editing, color changer, design tool

Header.title: Color Replace
Header.subtitle: Professional Online Image Color Replacement Tool

ColorReplaceSettings.title: Color Replacement Settings
ColorReplaceSettings.emptyState: No color replacement rules. Click "Add Color Pair" to start

ToolDescription.title: Free Online Image Color Replacement Tool
ToolDescription.mainDescription: Transform your images instantly with our professional color replacement tool. Perfect for designers, marketers, and content creators who need to change image colors quickly and efficiently. Whether you're creating product variants, adjusting brand colors, or experimenting with design options, our tool provides precise color manipulation while preserving image quality - all directly in your browser, with no upload required.

features.title: Professional Features for Image Color Editing

feature1.title: Smart Color Replacement Technology
feature1.description: Replace any color in your images with pixel-perfect accuracy. Our advanced color matching algorithm ensures smooth transitions and professional-looking results, perfect for product photos and design assets.

feature2.title: Multi-Color Replacement
feature2.description: Save time by replacing multiple colors simultaneously. Ideal for brand color updates, theme changes, and creating product variations. Add multiple color pairs to transform entire color schemes at once.

feature3.title: Efficient Batch Processing
feature3.description: Process multiple images simultaneously with our powerful batch processing feature. Perfect for e-commerce product photos, marketing materials, and large design projects. Save hours of manual editing time.

feature4.title: Professional Color Selection Tools
feature4.description: Use our precise eyedropper tool to pick exact colors from your images. Compatible with hex codes and RGB values, making it easy to match your brand colors perfectly.

feature5.title: Advanced Color Matching Controls
feature5.description: Fine-tune your color replacements with our intelligent similarity controls. Perfect for handling gradients, shadows, and complex color variations while maintaining natural-looking results.

feature6.title: Secure Local Processing
feature6.description: Experience fast, secure image processing right in your browser. No file upload needed - your images never leave your device, ensuring complete privacy and instant results.

ToolDescription.privacyDescription: Your privacy and data security are our top priority. Unlike other online tools, our image processor works entirely in your browser - your images are never uploaded to any server. Work confidently knowing your sensitive design assets stay private and secure on your device.

UsageExamples.title: Usage Examples
UsageExamples.description: Here are some examples of how to use the color replacement tool:

example1.title: Multiple Color Pair settings
example1.description: Replace multiple colors simultaneously by adding multiple color pairs.
example1.beforeAlt: Empty state illustration with red color scheme
example1.afterAlt: Empty state illustration with blue color scheme

example2.title: Batch Images Processing
example2.description: Process multiple images at once for efficient batch processing.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.description: Privacy policy for Color Replace image color replacement tool
Privacy.keywords: privacy policy, data protection, GDPR, user privacy, image processing

information_collection.title: Information We Collect
information_collection.description: We collect minimal information to provide our color replacement service:
information_collection.uploaded_images: Images you upload for color replacement (processed locally in your browser)
information_collection.usage_data: Basic usage statistics and analytics data
information_collection.device_info: Device and browser information for service optimization

data_usage.title: How We Use Your Data
data_usage.description: We use collected information for the following purposes:
data_usage.provide_service: To provide and maintain our color replacement service
data_usage.improve_service: To improve and optimize our tool's performance
data_usage.analytics: To understand usage patterns and improve user experience
data_usage.advertising: To display relevant advertisements through Google AdSense

data_storage.title: Data Storage and Security
data_storage.description: Your privacy and data security are our top priorities:
data_storage.temporary: Uploaded images are processed locally in your browser and are not stored on our servers

third_party.title: Third-Party Services
third_party.description: We use the following third-party services:
third_party.analytics: For website analytics and performance monitoring
third_party.advertising: For displaying advertisements on our website

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience and provide analytics.
cookies.control: You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings or our consent management platform.

user_rights.title: Your Rights
user_rights.description: Under GDPR and other privacy laws, you have the following rights:
user_rights.access: Right to access your personal data
user_rights.correction: Right to correct inaccurate personal data
user_rights.deletion: Right to request deletion of your personal data

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through our website.

updates.title: Policy Updates
updates.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.

Terms.title: Terms of Service
Terms.description: Terms of service for Color Replace image color replacement tool

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By accessing and using our Color Replace tool, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

service_description.title: Service Description
service_description.description: Color Replace is a free online tool that provides:
service_description.color_replacement: Image color replacement and editing capabilities
service_description.image_processing: Local image processing without server uploads
service_description.free_service: Free access to all basic color replacement features

user_responsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
user_responsibilities.description: As a user of our service, you agree to:
user_responsibilities.legal_content: Only upload and process images you have the legal right to use
user_responsibilities.copyright: Respect copyright and intellectual property rights
user_responsibilities.appropriate_use: Use the service for lawful purposes only
user_responsibilities.no_harmful_content: Not upload harmful, offensive, or inappropriate content

prohibited_uses.title: Prohibited Uses
prohibited_uses.description: You may not use our service for:
prohibited_uses.copyright_violation: Violating copyright or intellectual property rights
prohibited_uses.system_abuse: Attempting to abuse or overload our systems

intellectual_property.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual_property.description: The Color Replace tool and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by us and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.
intellectual_property.user_content: You retain all rights to images you upload and process using our tool.

disclaimers.title: Disclaimers
disclaimers.description: Our service is provided on an 'as is' basis. We make no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaim all other warranties including:
disclaimers.as_is: The service is provided without warranty of any kind
disclaimers.availability: We do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free service
disclaimers.accuracy: We do not warrant the accuracy or completeness of results

limitation_liability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation_liability.description: In no event shall Color Replace be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.

termination.title: Termination
termination.description: We may terminate or suspend your access immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.description: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will try to provide at least 30 days notice prior to any new terms taking effect.

governing_law.title: Governing Law
governing_law.description: These Terms shall be interpreted and governed by the laws of the jurisdiction in which we operate, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us through our website.
